data.text:
Elsa Einstein mostly typed, single page letter, signed, composed upon her husband Albert Einstein's personal stationery.

Measurements: 7.25'' x 10.5''

Condition: Near Fine Overall, with folds

With partial translation from the original German to English (below)

Composed upon her husband Albert Einstein's personal stationery. Writing from the ''White House'', their vacation home in Old Lyme, Connecticut on 10 June 1935, Elsa invites her cousin Erich for a visit. Refers to having spent a week in Bermuda and having enjoyed it etc.

Letter reads in part:
